creator: higemogejp
descriptionHtml:
Experience the battles of Japan's Warring States period!

BrickBreaker x Samurai x FunnyStory

Defeat famous samurai from all over Japan and aim to unite the country while enjoying a loose conversation with the ditzy character Zy in SamuraiBrickBreaker.
Enjoy the story told by Zy and the ending that comes after clearing the hard mode.

- Features
Zy lightly introduces anecdotes about famous samurai and specialties from around Japan.
The game is based on the BrickBreaker rules, and with items that enhance the action.
In this casual action game, comical samurais run amok!

- Story
The time is the Warring States period.
In Hinomoto, warring feudal lords are fighting for supremacy in various regions.
The protagonist, who lost his parents at the age of two, follows his father's dying wish and sets out with his mentor and nurturing parent, "Zy", to unify the country.

- Rules
The rules are simple. Everyone knows the BrickBreaker rules.

Support the blue samurai (you) by moving the fence (paddle) left and right!
If you can destroy the enemy troops within the time limit, you win.
You will lose the game if you lose the blue samurai or your strength becomes zero.

- Strategy Points
The position of the paddle to bounce back is important.
If you bounce on the right side of the bar, it will bounce to the right, and if you bounce on the left side, it will bounce to the left.
Adjust the position well to cut into the enemy's weak points.

- There are four types of items you can use to get through the battlefield.
Get the rice bales to bring reinforcements!
Get a cannon and fire it!
Get a rice ball and the blue samurai (you) will be at full strength.
Get a hammer and you'll have full bar endurance.

- Collect Oval coin to strengthen your army.
Strengthen the parameters of the blue samurai, reinforcements, and paddle to face off against powerful enemies.
Strengthen your cannon to increase its loading speed.
Strengthen the rice bales to increase the number of reinforcements.

You can reset your parameters at any time, and all of the Oval coin you've earned will be returned to you, except for the ones you've used for certain functions, so feel free to explore the parameters that suit you best.

- About Score
Attacking enemies in succession will generate a combo.
The more combos you make, the higher your score.
The combo resets when you hit the paddle.
When you win, the more reinforcements you have left, the more bonuses you get.
The faster the clearing time, the more bonuses you get.
When you win, you always get 1 Oval coin as a win bonus.
In addition, you can win Oval coins according to your score.

- Score ranking function
A ranking function is provided for each stage and each difficulty level.

- Challenging elements
Each stage has an extra mode that can be opened in five levels.
In the extra mode, you can fight against enemy forces with enhanced strength, attack power, attack speed, etc.
Please also enjoy the loose conversation with Zy when it is unlocked.

- New idea! The player can adjust the display interval of advertisements.
You can use the Oval coin you earn in the reinforcement screen to extend the viewing timing of reward ads.
The initial interval is 60 seconds, but it can be extended to a maximum of 15 minutes.

With this feature, players can choose to make their play cycle shorter, expanding the scope of their strategy.
descriptionShort: A Funny Zy The Road to Heavenly Unity
